languages.text: "Старость. Распутство. Старые раны. Он уже наполовину состоял из {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g}, мой добрый батюшка. Особенно после покушения — видите ли, его пытались убить лет эдак двенадцать тому назад".

"Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."
languages.original_text: "Старость. Распутство. Старые раны. Он уже наполовину состоял из {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g}, мой добрый батюшка. Особенно после покушения — видите ли, его пытались убить лет эдак двенадцать тому назад".

traits.locale_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end implants made up half of my good Papa. Especially after the attempted assassination — people tried to kill him, you see, about twenty years ago."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end implants made up half of my good Papa. Especially after the attempted assassination — people tried to kill him, you see, about twenty years ago."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more implant than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twenty years ago."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more implant than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twenty years ago."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

traits.locale_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: “老死的，浪死的，旧伤复发病死的。我老爹最后那段日子里，看起来已经不像个人了，更像是一堆{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。尤其是那次刺杀之后，有人打算要他的命。我想想，那大概是十二年前吧。”
languages.original_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."

traits.locale_text: “老死的，浪死的，旧伤复发病死的。我老爹最后那段日子里，看起来已经不像个人了，更像是一堆{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。尤其是那次刺杀之后，有人打算要他的命。我想想，那大概是十二年前吧。”
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: «La edad, los abusos, las viejas heridas... al final, mi padre era más {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} que carne. Especialmente desde el intento de asesinato. Alguien intentó matarlo, ¿sabe? Hará unos doce años».
languages.original_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."

traits.locale_text: «La edad, los abusos, las viejas heridas... al final, mi padre era más {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} que carne. Especialmente desde el intento de asesinato. Alguien intentó matarlo, ¿sabe? Hará unos doce años».
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: 「年。堕落。古傷が致命傷になった。理由はいろいろあるが、最後は人間ってより{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}が主体だったな。暗殺されそうになってから特にそうだ――12年くらい前、親父を殺そうとする奴らがいたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."

traits.locale_text: 「年。堕落。古傷が致命傷になった。理由はいろいろあるが、最後は人間ってより{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}が主体だったな。暗殺されそうになってから特にそうだ――12年くらい前、親父を殺そうとする奴らがいたんだ」
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: "Altersschwäche. Ausschweifung. Alte Wunden. Am Ende war mein alter Vater nur noch ein einziges {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g}, aber kein Mensch mehr. Vor allem nach dem Anschlagsversuch – jemand wollte ihn töten, wisst Ihr, vor etwa zwölf Jahren."
languages.original_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."

traits.locale_text: "Altersschwäche. Ausschweifung. Alte Wunden. Am Ende war mein alter Vater nur noch ein einziges {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantat{/g}, aber kein Mensch mehr. Vor allem nach dem Anschlagsversuch – jemand wollte ihn töten, wisst Ihr, vor etwa zwölf Jahren."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: « De vieillesse. De débauche. De ses vieilles blessures. Sur la fin, mon père n'était plus qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} ambulant. Surtout depuis la tentative d'assassinat. Quelqu'un a essayé de le tuer il y a une douzaine d'années, vous voyez. »
languages.original_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."

traits.locale_text: « De vieillesse. De débauche. De ses vieilles blessures. Sur la fin, mon père n'était plus qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} ambulant. Surtout depuis la tentative d'assassinat. Quelqu'un a essayé de le tuer il y a une douzaine d'années, vous voyez. »
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: "Yaşlılıktan. Âlemcilikten. Eski yaralarından. Son zamanlarında babam insandan çok {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implanttı{/g}. Özellikle de o suikast girişiminden sonra. On iki yıl önce birileri canına kast etmeye kalkıştı da."
languages.original_text: "Age. Debauchery. Old wounds. By the end, my old dad was more {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} than man. Especially after the assassination attempt — people tried to kill him, you see, about twelve years ago."

traits.locale_text: "Yaşlılıktan. Alemcilikten. Eski yaralarından. Son zamanlarında babam insandan çok {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}tı. Özellikle şu suikast girişiminden sonra. On iki yıl önce insanlar onu öldürmeye çalışıyordu."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion
